FINAL LAB TASK 5

This portfolio demonstrates the use of SQL views, stored procedures, and stored functions to manage and manipulate database data.

Step-by-Step Process

  • Set up MySQL Workbench and execute practice queries using democodes.sql.
  • Use the inventory.sql file for the main tasks.
  • Create views for vendor and product filtering.
  • Create a stored procedure to update vendor names.
  • Create a function to retrieve product details by parameters.
